name: Beheaded Vengeful Spirit
description: The Beheaded Vengeful Spirit embodies rage and vengeance, possessing a high Charisma value that allows it to unleash powerful psychic attacks.
memorable: Its ability to decapitate targets and cause emotional rage when attacked makes it a truly terrifying foe.
goals: To manipulate and destroy its enemies through psychic attacks and physical intimidation.
relations: May be encountered alongside other undead creatures or as a servant of a necromancer.
environment: Typically found in haunted locations or battlefields where it once struggled.
strengths: Immunity to cold, necrotic, and poison damage, along with various condition immunities, enhances its resilience in combat.
weaknesses: Low physical strength, which hampers its effectiveness in melee combat.
attacks: Uses psychic damage attacks that can inflict emotional effects, enabling it to manipulate foes on the battlefield.
most_powerful_ability: Decapitation, which can potentially kill targets by severing their heads, is its most deadly and unique ability.
senses: Possesses darkvision allowing it to see in darkness.
skills: Strong resistance to mental and emotional effects due to its high Charisma saving throw.
additional_information: Can move through solid objects but takes damage if it ends its turn inside one.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep due to its undead nature.
Uses a special ability called Angry Defiance to boost its defensive capabilities considerably.
